channel.title: Public Key Not Available
channel.description:
Hello,
Trying to update a Debian template, but getting an error message:
GPG error: https://deb.whonix.org bullseye InRelease: The following signatures couldn’t be verified because the public key is not available: NO_PUBKEY
The repository ‘https://deb.whonix.org bullseye InRelease’ is not signed
trying to troubleshoot
Thanks

item.title: Public Key Not Available
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Did you follow instructions?

Kicksecure – 21 Jan 22

Install Kicksecure ™ inside Debian

Kicksecure ™ can be installed on top of an existing Debian installation.

Read full topic
